item.title: NaPoWriMo Entry
item.description: I wrote a story for NaPoWriMo. For those that don’t know what it is it’s basically a self-imposed challange to write a My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic fanfiction. I didn’t get to the 50k, but I did get to the 25k mark. Here it is. Eventually I will go over it and polish it up for editing. Right now it has a few major flaws.
